title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, July 30, 1861
summary: Hotchkiss describes his recent illness, the army's move from McDowell to Monterey, Va., and the possibilities for a post with General Lee's staff.
keywords: Death/Casualties, Women, Medicine/Hospitals, Military Authority, Family, Camp Life, Troop Movement, Desertion/Leave, American Civil War
